1620567834_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5.body: In 2015 I started trading on bitrex, I made some profit but lost it quickly. With the best of btc I got CS GO for my brother lol. Then I also lost some money on onecoin cus I was dumb but anyway that wasn't a real crypto. After that I worked for a crypto related company as a junior dev, there I learned more about the real deal. Last year I made some profit on coinbase but I'm not interested in trading anymore. More interested tot learn about p2p systems now.
